paper_abstract: We present an incomplete filtering algorithm for the circuit constraint. The filter removes redundant values by eliminating nonhamiltonian edges from the associated graph. We identify nonhamiltonian edges by analyzing a smaller graph with labeled edges that is defined on a separator of the original graph. The complexity of the procedure for each separator S is approximately O(vertical bar S vertical bar(5)). We found that it identified all infeasible instances and eliminated about one-third of the redundant domain elements in feasible instances.
paper_title: A filter for the circuit constraint
